languages.text: {n}Зубастые механизмы жалят вашу плоть, и кровь стекает по желобкам в нутро алтаря. Что-то щелкает, и двери склепа открываются с пронзительным скрипом. За ними царит непроглядный мрак.{/n}

{n}The panel's mechanical teeth sting your flesh, and you feel your blood trickling down the small ducts into the altar's bowels. You hear a click, and the crypt doors open with a piercing creak. Beyond them, you see nothing but darkness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Зубастые механизмы жалят вашу плоть, и кровь стекает по желобкам в нутро алтаря. Что-то щелкает, и двери склепа открываются с пронзительным скрипом. За ними царит непроглядный мрак.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The panel's mechanical teeth sting your flesh, and you feel your blood trickling down the small ducts into the altar's bowels. You hear a click, and the doors of the crypt open with a piercing creak. Beyond them, you see nothing but darkness.{/n}

{n}The panel's mechanical teeth sting your flesh, and you feel your blood trickling down the small ducts into the altar's bowels. You hear a click, and the crypt doors open with a piercing creak. Beyond them, you see nothing but darkness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les dents mécaniques viennent percer votre chair, faisant ruisseler votre sang dans les conduits menant aux entrailles de l'autel. Vous entendez un déclic, et les portes de la crypte s'ouvrent dans un grincement. Au-delà des battants, vous ne voyez rien d'autre que les ténèbres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The panel's mechanical teeth sting your flesh, and you feel your blood trickling down the small ducts into the altar's bowels. You hear a click, and the crypt doors open with a piercing creak. Beyond them, you see nothing but darkness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les dents mécaniques viennent percer votre chair, faisant ruisseler votre sang dans les conduits menant aux entrailles de l'autel. Vous entendez un déclic, et les portes de la crypte s'ouvrent dans un grincement. Au-delà des battants, vous ne voyez rien d'autre que les ténèbres.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los dientes mecánicos del panel se clavan en tu carne y sientes que tu sangre se desliza hacia los pequeños conductos al interior del altar. Oyes un chasquido y las puertas de la cripta se abren con un crujido ensordecedor. Al otro lado solo hay oscuridad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The panel's mechanical teeth sting your flesh, and you feel your blood trickling down the small ducts into the altar's bowels. You hear a click, and the crypt doors open with a piercing creak. Beyond them, you see nothing but darkness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los dientes mecánicos del panel se clavan en tu carne y sientes que tu sangre se desliza hacia los pequeños conductos al interior del altar. Oyes un chasquido y las puertas de la cripta se abren con un crujido ensordecedor. Al otro lado solo hay oscuridad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}面板的机械牙齿嵌入你的皮肉之中，你感觉到你的鲜血顺着细密的管道流入了祭坛的内脏之中。随后，你听到咔哒一声。地下墓穴的大门开了，发出了刺耳的嘎吱声。在大门后面，你看到的只有一片黑暗。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The panel's mechanical teeth sting your flesh, and you feel your blood trickling down the small ducts into the altar's bowels. You hear a click, and the crypt doors open with a piercing creak. Beyond them, you see nothing but darkness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}面板的机械牙齿嵌入你的皮肉之中，你感觉到你的鲜血顺着细密的管道流入了祭坛的内脏之中。随后，你听到咔哒一声。地下墓穴的大门开了，发出了刺耳的嘎吱声。在大门后面，你看到的只有一片黑暗。{/n}

languages.text: {n}パネルの機械の歯があなたの肌を刺し、自分の血液が小さなダクトを伝って祭壇の腸に流れ込む感覚がした。カチッとした音が聞こえ、ギシギシと音を立てて地下室の扉が開く。その向こうには暗闇しか見えない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The panel's mechanical teeth sting your flesh, and you feel your blood trickling down the small ducts into the altar's bowels. You hear a click, and the crypt doors open with a piercing creak. Beyond them, you see nothing but darkness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パネルの機械の歯があなたの肌を刺し、自分の血液が小さなダクトを伝って祭壇の腸に流れ込む感覚がした。カチッとした音が聞こえ、ギシギシと音を立てて地下室の扉が開く。その向こうには暗闇しか見えない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die mechanischen Zähne des Fachs beißen in dein Fleisch. Du spürst, wie dein Blut durch die kleinen Öffnungen in die Eingeweide des Altars tropft. Du hörst ein Klicken und die Türen der Krypta öffnen sich mit einem beißenden Knarzen. Dahinter siehst du nichts als Dunkelheit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The panel's mechanical teeth sting your flesh, and you feel your blood trickling down the small ducts into the altar's bowels. You hear a click, and the crypt doors open with a piercing creak. Beyond them, you see nothing but darkness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die mechanischen Zähne des Fachs beißen in dein Fleisch. Du spürst, wie dein Blut durch die kleinen Öffnungen in die Eingeweide des Altars tropft. Du hörst ein Klicken und die Türen der Krypta öffnen sich mit einem beißenden Knarzen. Dahinter siehst du nichts als Dunkelheit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Panelin mekanik dişleri, etini deliyor. Küçük kanallardan sunağın iç kısımlarına kanının damladığını hissediyorsun. Bir tıkırtı duyuyorsun ve mahzenin kapıları, kulakları sağır eden bir gıcırtıyla açılıyor. Ötesinde karanlıktan başka bir şey görülmüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The panel's mechanical teeth sting your flesh, and you feel your blood trickling down the small ducts into the altar's bowels. You hear a click, and the crypt doors open with a piercing creak. Beyond them, you see nothing but darkness.{/n}
